2011 ISM Photography Competition
The ISM photography competition starts on the 3rd October. The theme of the competition is “Shadow and Light.” This will be discussed with our students during the assembly next week.
Photographs can be in any format such as black and white, portrait, landscape or colour.
Each entrant is allowed to submit one photograph to the competition.
There are prizes for the winners of each category:
-Years 4-5
-Years 6-9
-Parents + Teachers
Contestants must bring photographs to the Art room no later than the 27th October and the winners will be announced in Assembly on Monday the 31st.
Winter Uniform
Just to clarify the present status of school uniform for all students. Winter Uniform will become compulsory from Monday 24th October. (Immediately after the Half Term Break) Until then, perhaps somewhat optimistically, I am hoping that we will experience some warm days in amongst the increasingly chilly ones. With this in mind, I would like to suggest common sense prevailing. In the next two weeks please ensure that children are dressed in the school uniform most appropriate for the temperatures that day.
Thank you for your continued support with uniform, the children are generally looking very smart in school.
UN Day
UN day will take place on Friday 28th October. However, just to reassure all parents, we will be adopting a different approach to the event this year. Upper campus and Lower Campus will be following different themes that will be largely led by the teachers and students themselves. With this in mind, much less parent work will be needed this year and so please do not feel anxious regarding preparations. More details will follow within the next week!
